00015 <h4>Disclaimer</h4>
00016 <p>
00017         The author is not bound in any way to phone carrier companies (from now, the &ldquo;Carriers&rdquo;) supported by the Software.
00018         By using the Software you agree to use the service in conformity with the terms of service (&ldquo;ToS&rdquo;) of your Carrier.
00019         Any use of the Software in violation of the ToS, aimed at sending unsolicited messages (SPAM)
00020         or in violation of existing laws is strictly forbidden.
00021 </p>
00022 <p>
00023         The author is not responsible for the use of the Software by its users.
00024         By using the Software, the user accepts to EXPLICITLY DISCHARGE the author from ANY RESPONSIBILITY
00025         arisen from the use of the Software. In particular, the author won&rsquo;t be considered responsible for unsolicited, obscene,
00026         diffamatory messages sent by users of the Software.
00027 </p>
00028 <p>
00029         The Software plays a role of broker between the user and the Carrier&rsquo;s web SMS service.
00030         The user acknowledges that, in order to achieve this function, the Software must know the 
00031         credentials to access the service (username and password, from now, the &ldquo;Credentials&rdquo;) and
00032         the relevant parameters of the SMS message (recipient number, text of the message, from now, the &ldquo;Parameters&rdquo;).
00033         The Software uses the Credentials of the user exclusively in order to access the Carrier&rsquo;s service and perform
00034         the sending of the messages. Credentials and Parameters will never be shared with the author or any third party.
00035         For the convenience of the user, Credentials are stored on her computer in order to be readily available for subsequent uses
00036         of the Software. Sent messages are saved in the folder ~/Library/SMS.
00037 </p>
00038 <p>
00039         The Software can not be used for any reason to make emergency calls.
00040 </p>
00041 <p>
00042         Some marks belong and/or could be registered trademarks of the respective owners.
00043 </p>
